text: Say, I was searching for any libraries for relation-extraction or named entity recognition from text in Julia. This would probably fall under NLP. I could not find anything, so I was wondering if anyone knew of any julia implementations?

elements.text: Say, I was searching for any libraries for relation-extraction or named entity recognition from text in Julia. This would probably fall under NLP. I could not find anything, so I was wondering if anyone knew of any julia implementations?

text: Does nothing under <https://github.com/JuliaText> fit the bill?

<@UMY1LV01G> Oh thanks for pointing this out. I found at least Named entity recognition in <https://juliatext.github.io/TextAnalysis.jl/latest/ner/>. I did not find relation extraction though. So if anything I might need to write that up myself, but that just gives me a chance to contribute.
